title: Market Outlook And Supply Chain Constraints
itunes:title: Market Outlook And Supply Chain Constraints
description:
Ira Jersey, Chief US interest rate strategist for Bloomberg Intelligence, discusses the treasury market and Fed pricing. Kevin Nicholson, Global Fixed Income co-CIO, co-Head of Investment Committee from Riverfront Investment Group, talks about inflation, the Fed, and gives his market outlook. Huw Roberts, Director of Research and Sales at Quant Insights, talks about fixed income and gives his economic outlook for 2022. Andre Menezes, CEO of Next Gen Foods, discusses the alternative meat business and his company’s outlook for 2022. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Matt Miller.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
